content.html: I’ve wanted a second number for some time now, plus I have my Pixle 4a running GrapheneOS just sitting here. So I’m going to give Mint Mobile a try since it’s cheap and pretty easy to setup billing under an alias so the sim won’t be linked to me. Give me bonus tinfoil hat points!

content.html: I don’t know if we should keep feeding #Ukraine money, I’m a bit torn on it. But I do really like Zelensky, he’s a bit of a rockstar. While our president is sort of the guy who you don’t remember his name, but he worked the spotlight during the show.

summary:
Watched the documentary “What’s a Woman?” last night. I must say I very much agree mostly. I can go with affirming gender even though I do not agree fully with the whole pronoun thing. But hormone blockers and surgeries must stop until there are more long-term studies on their effects. Also, parents should have a say over both school and the government.
It’s such a sticky subject, but the reality is that children do not have the maturity or the knowledge to make such decisions.
					Continue reading →

content.html:
I don’t want to point people out, so I won’t. But telling people to not worry about their health and to feel no guilt eating a donut is about as irresponsible as someone with the title nutritionist could be. Not to say you can’t eat it, but it’s not good for you.

#diet #health

summary:
Am I wrong to think Twitter shadow-banning different accounts is no big deal? It’s Twitter; if you are relying on it for any information, you’re doing it wrong in the first place. If anything, it, at the most, should only be for getting ideas and researching the stuff on your own outside of Twitter.
Relying on any social media service as your main source of news or knowledge is an absolute mistake.
					Continue reading →
